list.title: List of Workspace tasks
list.dailyRateGraphDesc: Review progress of daily tasks. The daily task progress is average progress rate of each day of started tasks.

dashboard.title: Real-time task progress
dashboard.titleDesc: The task progress status is shown based on the time of your access to this page.
dashboard.countOfConditionsDesc: The "Task progress status" of Tasks/subtasks/phase in "Task management" is based on the Task schedule and Progress rate.

message.closeSure: Are you sure you want to end the selected tasks? If you end it
message.deleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete the selected tasks? If you delete it

detail.title: Selected task details
detail.subTasksProgressGraphDesc: The progress of subtask is calculated based on the progress of overall phases.

subTaskDetail.title: Selected subtask details
subTaskDetail.stepsProgressGraphDesc: The progress of phase is calculated based on the progress of overall activity.

new.title: Add new tasks
new.contentsInfo: Content details of newly added task
new.sceneGroupInfoDesc: The selected content is added as a task. The scene group of content is turned to subtask and you can set up an assignee and its schedule.

manage.registerNewTaskInfoDesc: Set up a task schedule and task assignee to record task report data based on the schedule.
manage.taskAddNoticeDesc: Based on the information registered in the existing task
manage.taskWorkerDesc: Setting the task assignee results in assigning the same person to be the subtask assignee
manage.taskPositionDesc: Notify the task location to task assignee
manage.subTaskScheduleDesc: Sub-task schedules can be changed within the given task period.
manage.subTaskWorkerChangeDesc: Receive subtask reports with updated information

newTarget.duplicate: Duplicate content and register it as a task
newTarget.duplicateDesc: Duplicate content into task management. Manage tasks by issuing new task targets to duplicated content.
newTarget.transform: Switch contents to tasks and then update
newTarget.transformDesc: Use an existing content target as a task target. Content switched to a task goes to the task management item and cannot be managed in the content menu.
newTarget.registerComment: Updating a new task with the information you entered.

message.registerStroageFail: Updating task failed due to the insuffient storage capacity. Please purchase more storage.

addTarget.duplicateDesc: Duplicate content used in an "existing task" into the "new task content". Issue new task targets for the composition details of duplicated content.
addTarget.transformDesc: Ending the exisiting task and no further reporting will be made. You will be receiving Task report from the newly updated task and the same target of existing task will be used.
addTarget.registerComment: Create additional task with the information you entered.

message.registerStroageFail: Failed to create additional task due to insuffient storage capacity
